name: Marble Prototype
description:
This is a momentum-based 3D physics-based marble platformer focused on maximizing character acceleration and physics challenges.

[NOTE] This is not a game but instead a bare-bones prototype with no menus or pausing, if you decide to give it a try, quit using Alt-F

KEYBOARD & MOUSE
Camera Movement
 - Mouse

Player Movement
 - WASD

Jump
 - Spacebar

Force Respawn
 - R

CONTROLLER
Camera Movement
 - Right Thumbstick

Player Movement
 - Left Thumbstick

Jump
 - A or B

Force Respawn
 - X or Y
